parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Joins the unit to the given group, if position id is available, this one is used. Avoid any radio communication related to joining.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''joinAsSilent''' [group, id]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [group, id]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> group: [[Group]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> id: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[joinAsSilent]] [_group, 4];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> To get the position id: <code>getUnitPositionId = {
	[[private]] ["_vvn", "_str"];
	_vvn = [[vehicleVarName]] _this;
	_this [[setVehicleVarName]] "";
	_str = [[str]] _this;
	_this [[setVehicleVarName]] _vvn;
	[[parseNumber]] (_str [[select]] [(_str [[find]] ":") + 1])
};
[[player]] [[joinAsSilent]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[createGroup]] [[west]], 5];
_id = [[player]] [[call]] getUnitPositionId;
[[hint]] [[str]] _id; //5</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[join]], [[joinAs]], [[joinSilent]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dt class="note">Unknown <dd class="note">I have not done a thorough test but this function doesn't seem to work for Civilians, use [[joinSilent]] instead.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
